WHO warns of 'second peak' in areas with declining COVID-19 cases tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739746 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/739746/who-warns-of-second-peak-in-areas-with-declining-covid-19-cases/story/ Countries where coronavirus infections are declining could still face an "immediate second peak" if they let up too soon on measures to halt the outbreak, the World Health Organization (WHO) said on Monday. Tue, 26 May 2020 02:08:01 +0800
China threatens US counter measures if punished for Hong Kong law tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739745 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/739745/china-threatens-us-counter-measures-if-punished-for-hong-kong-law/story/ China on Monday threatened counter measures against the United States if it is punished for plans to impose on Hong Kong a sedition law, which the business hub's security chief hailed as a new tool to defeat "terrorism". Tue, 26 May 2020 01:45:12 +0800
Duterte to Duque on waves : Don t be so touchy tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739741 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/739741/duterte-to-duque-on-waves-don-t-be-so-touchy/story/ Duterte told Duque, who was in the meeting, "not to be too touchy on issues because there will always be pros and cons." "Pakinggan lang natin because this is a democracy. But in democracy, there are issues and attacks . . .I know you are hard-pressed and I know your situation," Duterte said. Tue, 26 May 2020 01:31:12 +0800
Duque to Duterte: I don't know couple behind allegedly overpriced medical equipment tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739744 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/739744/duque-to-duterte-i-don-t-know-couple-behind-allegedly-overpriced-medical-equipment/story/ Health Secretary Francisco Duque III has denied knowing the couple who allegedly offered vital medical equipment at a very high price to the Philippine government amid the coronavirus pandemic. Tue, 26 May 2020 01:27:25 +0800
Puting paniki, may dala nga kayang pag-asa para makahanap ng lunas vs COVID-19? tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739743 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/739743/puting-paniki-may-dala-nga-kayang-pag-asa-para-makahanap-ng-lunas-vs-covid-19/story/ Nang may namataan na isang puting paniki sa isla ng Samal sa Davao, ang ilan sa mga residente, nabahala. Pero may iba naman umaasa na baka may dala itong suwerte at maging hudyat upang makahanap ng lunas sa COVID-19. Tue, 26 May 2020 01:25:02 +0800
British PM's adviser defies calls to quit over accusations of flouting lockdown tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739742 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/739742/british-pm-s-adviser-defies-calls-to-quit-over-accusations-of-flouting-lockdown/story/ British Prime Minister Boris Johnson's closest aide defied calls to quit on Monday over accusations that he flouted a coronavirus lockdown by driving 250 miles from London to northern England. Tue, 26 May 2020 01:03:05 +0800
Clinical trial of hydroxychloroquine for COVID-19 patients suspended - WHO tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739740 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/739740/clinical-trial-of-hydroxychloroquine-for-covid-19-patients-suspended-who/story/ A clinical trial of malaria drug hydroxychloroquine in coronavirus disease (COVID-19) patients has been suspended amid safety concerns, World Health Organization (WHO Director General Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus said on Monday. Tue, 26 May 2020 00:23:15 +0800
Duterte: No opening of classes without vaccine vs. COVID-19 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739739 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/739739/duterte-no-opening-of-classes-without-vaccine-vs-covid-19/story/ In a televised address at past midnight Tuesday, Duterte said it was useless to discuss the opening of classes without the vaccine. "I will not allow the opening of classes. Bahala na," Duterte said. "Wala nang aral. Laro na lang. Unless I am sure that they are really safe." Tue, 26 May 2020 00:22:13 +0800
Montenegro becomes Europe's first coronavirus-free state, PM says tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739737 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/739737/montenegro-becomes-europe-s-first-coronavirus-free-state-pm-says/story/ Montenegro's prime minister on Monday declared the country coronavirus-free - a move vital for its Adriatic tourism industry coming 69 days after it reported its first case and after 20 without a new one. Tue, 26 May 2020 00:10:36 +0800
Duterte defends Duque amid alleged overpriced PPE procurement tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739736 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/739736/duterte-defends-duque-amid-alleged-overpriced-ppe-procurement/story/ “I gave him (Duque) the instruction and I admit it in public now. Sabi ko sa kaniya, Do everything you can. I do not care if it's expensive. Go, just go ahead and do something about it kasi ipitan tayo dito, ” Duterte said in a televised briefing. Tue, 26 May 2020 00:09:28 +0800
Sa higit 35k OFWs na isinailalim ng PRC sa COVID-19 test, nasa 2-3% ang positibo sa virus--Gordon tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739735 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/739735/sa-higit-35k-ofws-na-isinailalim-ng-prc-sa-covid-19-test-nasa-2-3-ang-positibo-sa-virus-gordon/story/ Mahigit 35,000 overseas Filipino workers na bumalik sa bansa ang isinailalim umano sa COVID-19 test ng Philippine Red Cross, ayon sa chairman nito na si Senador Richard Gordon. Tue, 26 May 2020 00:04:11 +0800
Two suspected BIFF members killed in Maguindanao encounter tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739734 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/regions/739734/two-suspected-biff-members-killed-in-maguindanao-encounter/story/ Two suspected Bangsamoro Islamic Freedom Fighters (BIFF) members were killed in an encounter with the troops of 33rd Infantry Battalion of Joint Task Force Central in Maguindanao, according to a statement issued by the 6th Infantry Division. Mon, 25 May 2020 23:16:59 +0800
8 buntis na OFWs, napaanak na sa quarantine facilities habang hinihintay ang COVID-19 test results tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739732 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/739732/8-buntis-na-ofws-napaanak-na-sa-quarantine-facilities-habang-hinihintay-ang-covid-19-test-results/story/ Walo sa halos 100 buntis na ni-repatriate na overseas Filipino workers (OFWs) ang napaanak na habang hinihintay ang resulta ng kanilang coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) tests sa kanilang tinutuluyang quarantine facilities. Mon, 25 May 2020 23:10:12 +0800
Philippines still off target of 30k COVID-19 tests daily, says expert tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739731 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/739731/philippines-still-off-target-of-30k-covid-19-tests-daily-says-expert/story/ Earlier on Monday, Harry Roque said that the Philippines increased its testing capacity to 32,100 on May 20. Data from the Department of Health (DOH), however, show that only 8,179 samples were processed on May 20. Mon, 25 May 2020 23:06:19 +0800
